overview:
Greg McNutt is an experienced technologist and executive manager with 30 years of systems, development, and engineering management experience. He oversees the technology operations, including operational infrastructure, development, quality assurance, release, and configuration management.

Prior to his current role with Vendio, Greg most recently worked at Rearden Commerce in the architecture group focusing on deployment improvements, DB connection pooling, and change review processes. Greg had previously worked for Vendio from 1999-2005, where he led the development of the company’s scalable, low cost open source platform, serving in the role of CTO. Greg also spent 10 years at Sun Microsystems where he provided OS support for the Sunfire platform, served as Technical Lead for several Solaris releases, and supported OS development for secure operating system products.
